name: Alice Johnson
content: Python developer with 3 years experience in FastAPI, REST APIs, Docker and MongoDB. Built scalable microservices and automated test pipelines.

name: Bob Smith
content: Frontend developer experienced in React, Redux, and TypeScript. Some exposure to Node.js and Express.

name: Carol Lee
content: Software engineer with experience in Python, Django, RESTful APIs, and PostgreSQL. Also familiar with AWS and Docker.

name: David Brown
content: Full-stack developer with expertise in JavaScript, Node.js, and React. Experience with MongoDB and Express.

name: Eve Davis
content: Backend developer with experience in Python, Flask, and SQL databases. Familiar with Docker and Kubernetes.

name: Frank Wilson
content: DevOps engineer with experience in CI/CD pipelines, AWS, and Docker. Strong background in Linux systems administration.
